p: To prepare the long hairpin stem with 23 telomeric repeats, we first annealed ssDNA oligos (Stem oligos in Supplementary Table S1) using the temperature program the same as above. We also prepared the hairpin loop (Loop 1 oligo in Supplementary Table S1) using the same method. With cohesive end termini, we ligated the telomeric stem and the loop with a molar ratio of 1:5:10 (Stem 1/1c: stem 2/2c: loop 1) at 16°C for 12 h. Finally, the intermediate products were ligated to obtain the hairpin construct with 23 telomeric repeats at 16°C for 10 h, followed by 25°C for 2 h.
